comment.body: Well, that's ofcourse true to some extent, but too pessimistic, if not nihilistic. Social networks can really be much more than that. For example, yesterday I discovered link to mastodont here, registered there and found out it's full of communist transgenders. This somehow triggered me into delusional and psychotic mood, and I started messing with them (in non-violent way) and even switched to trolling commies at reddit and get banned in few subs already. This is like a little adventure. Also I really liked one commie girl (actually not a girl), but (s)he blocked me.

I've had issues like this weeks / months ago, but today both are working perfect for me. Maybe it's a matter of the server which you happen to spawn. Probably some player bots are causing much lags and today I was lucky to get into server without them.
